summary: This bill, the "Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment Act of 2025," aims to revise the boundaries of a coastal barrier unit in North Topsail Beach, North Carolina. It directs the Secretary of the Interior to exclude certain parcels from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System unit L06, specifically those zoned for non-conservation purposes. The bill defines relevant terms and specifies the map to be corrected.
